item.title: Getting started with Academic
item.description: This post, created by the Academic template’s author George Cushen, is an excellent reference for starting and maintaining your own Academic website. Academic makes it easy to create a beautiful website for free using Markdown. Customize anything on your site with widgets, themes, and language packs. Follow our easy step by step guide to learn how to build your own free website with Academic. Check out the personal demo or the business demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes.
